Name: Cute War：Zero 萌系战争：零
About the game: It is a simple SLG game. Take the cautious victory. • A unique style of Art • 3 camps: knight Viking samurai. • 6 kinds of soldiers. • 9 different forms of level. Operation guide: Pass S W A D to move the angle of view. Pass Q E to rotating angle of view. Pass mouse wheel to move Near perspective and far angle of view. In double - layer, three - layer map,You can close to the angle of view can hide the building.
